title: 10-15 minute queue times, This is stupid
body:
I average a 10 to 15 minute queue time, which is stupid for a game with millions of players. I know people say play support and it's instant. It's not. Even if i chose support and fill I still wait 15 minutes for a game. It's really annoying cause I'll sit down with 2 hours to play but only get 1 game because with queue times I couldn't fit 2 games. It says some thing like EST 2:30, and I see it says actual 17:00.
What is wrong with the queues?
a 15 minute queue, reset, 15 minutes, reset, 15 minutes, game, player declined, 5 minutes, game

replies.body: Your account currently has a [**low priority queue**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714). You'll need to wait through those queues until you find a match, and after playing through the required amount of games the LPQ will be lifted. Make sure to read through the [**Leaverbuster article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714) to get all the details.

Ahem. I know. This has been happening way before I got this. But it doesn't help. I can't even get rid of low priority because I can't get into a single game even as support and fill. So I'll say again. What's wrong?

It doesn't seem like anything is wrong at the moment. In your post you mentioned waiting 15 min then resetting the queue, that will not affect how many games you have left in the LPQ. In order to get those LPQ games out of the way, you'll have to wait through the LPQ and finish matches until the game limit has been played, which it looks like you've only got 5 games left.
I know reseting the damn queue wont stop lpq. Im saying I cant get rid of it because I can only get a game every 30 minutes. There is something wrong with the damn queues
Very long queue times are intended to happen when you're in the low priority queue.
I'm excited to see when he'll realize this lol

Is your IQ a negative number?I know what the low priority queue does.
I'm saying for the last 2 weeks before I had the LPQ it's been insanely long.
The LPQ isn't helping.
